K12D0726_H0676:73a-33: re hr'i: re zhes bya ba bri'o //
K12D0726_H0676:73a-34: ga'ur srin mgo dmar po dang 'khor lo phral nas gtsang po phar 'gram tshur 'gram du sbas na /
K12D0726_H0676:73a-36: dbye zhing dbang du bsdu ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:73a-40: rams rnams sbyar te dur khrod kyi ras la 'khor
K12D0726_H0676:73b-0: @73b lo gnyis bris te ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus
K12D0726_H0676:73b-1: su ha sa au tsa ha ha ha bri bar
K12D0726_H0676:73b-2: bya'o // ling tshe brgyad la ha aom ha /
K12D0726_H0676:73b-9: ha re ha zhes pa bris te /
K12D0726_H0676:73b-10: kha sbyar ka p'a lar bcug ste skud pa sngon
K12D0726_H0676:73b-11: pos bcings te dur khrod du sbas na bskrad par
K12D0726_H0676:73b-12: 'gyur ro // bskrad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:73b-13: de nas dbye ba'i 'khor lo ni /
K12D0726_H0676:73b-14: dur khrod kyi sol ba dang /
K12D0726_H0676:73b-17: dug rnams mnyam par bsres pa'i snag tshas 'khor lo
K12D0726_H0676:73b-18: phyi nang dang bcas pa'i ling tshe dgu pa bris
K12D0726_H0676:73b-19: te dbus su phat sv'a te ba data ta ha
K12D0726_H0676:73b-21: ling tshe nang ma brgyad la phat phat phat phat phat phat phat phat ces pa bri'o //
K12D0726_H0676:73b-22: ling tshe phyi ma brgyad la phat aom phat/
K12D0726_H0676:73b-29: phat re phat zhes bya ba bris te /
K12D0726_H0676:73b-31: 'ug pa'i sgo ngar bcug ste brag dang chu 'thab sar sgo nga sbas na /
K12D0726_H0676:73b-33: dbye ba'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:73b-34: de nas gsad pa'i 'khor lo ni /
K12D0726_H0676:74a-0: ske tshe rnams mnyam par sbyar bas ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo phyi nang dang @74a *//
K12D0726_H0676:74a-1: bcas pa bris te dbus su h'um sv'a m'a ra ya h'a phat ces bya ba bri'o //
K12D0726_H0676:74a-2: ling tshe nang ma la h'um phat h'um/
K12D0726_H0676:74a-9: phat h'um phat zhes bya ba bri'o //
K12D0726_H0676:74a-10: ling tshe phyi ma la h'um aom phat/
K12D0726_H0676:74a-17: h'um re phat zhes bya ba bris te rabs chad
K12D0726_H0676:74a-18: pho mo'i thod pa la bris te sngags mang du
K12D0726_H0676:74a-19: bzlas nas dur khrod du sbas na /
K12D0726_H0676:74a-21: gsad pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:74a-23: dha du ra'i chus ras sam /
K12D0726_H0676:74a-24: sho gu la ling tshe dgu pa phyi nang dang
K12D0726_H0676:74a-25: bcas pa'i 'khor lo bris te dbus su ha ha
K12D0726_H0676:74a-26: de ba tta ta ha zhes pa bri'o //
K12D0726_H0676:74a-27: ling tshe nang ma la hha hha hha hha hha hha hha hha bri bar bya'o //
K12D0726_H0676:74a-35: hha tu hha; hha re hha zhes bya ba bris
K12D0726_H0676:74a-36: te rtsi'i ga'ur bcug nas bzlas pa ci nas kyang
K12D0726_H0676:74a-37: myur bar byas te lam rgya gram du dong dang
K12D0726_H0676:74a-38: bcas par sbas te dha du ra spungs na /
K12D0726_H0676:74a-41: mar sbrang rtsi ba'i 'o mas ling ga bkrus na /
K12D0726_H0676:74a-43: myos byed kyi 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:74b-0: de @74b nas mnan pa'i 'khor lo ni /
K12D0726_H0676:74b-1: g-yam pa la ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor lo bris
K12D0726_H0676:74b-2: te yung ba'i chus ling tshe dgu pa'i dbus su
K12D0726_H0676:74b-3: ga sva stam bha ya stam bha ya gha ha
K12D0726_H0676:74b-4: zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o; ;ling tshe brgyad la
K12D0726_H0676:74b-5: ga aom ga / ga t'a ga /
K12D0726_H0676:74b-11: ga re ga zhes bya ba bris te 'khor lo kha sbyar nas lam rgya gram du sbas na /
K12D0726_H0676:74b-13: mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:74b-14: de nas mnan pa chen po ni /
K12D0726_H0676:74b-15: yung ba'i khu bas snag tsha byas te kham pa'i
K12D0726_H0676:74b-16: ga'u'i nang du phyi nang ling tshe dgu pa'i 'khor
K12D0726_H0676:74b-17: lo bris la sngags dgod pa ni /
K12D0726_H0676:74b-18: dbus su rga sva stam bha ya stam bha ya rga ha zhes bya ba bri'o //
K12D0726_H0676:74b-19: nang ma la ha ha ha ha ha ha ha ha zhes bya ba brgyad bri'o //
K12D0726_H0676:74b-20: de'i phyi rol gyi ling tshe brgyad la ni /
K12D0726_H0676:74b-28: rga re rga zhes bya ba bris te sgrub pa
K12D0726_H0676:74b-29: 'phags ma la byas la dgra gang nas 'ong ba'i
K12D0726_H0676:74b-31: srung bar 'gyur zhing dgra'i sgor sba na /
K12D0726_H0676:74b-33: dgra mnan pa'i 'khor lo'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:74b-34: de nas rig sngags kyi sbyor ba mnan par byed pa'i 'khor lo ni /
K12D0726_H0676:74b-35: yung ba'i khu bas g-yam pa'am /
K12D0726_H0676:75a-0: lhang tsher ma gnyis gang yang rung @75a *//
K12D0726_H0676:75a-1: ba la 'khor lo bris te ling tshe dgu pa la phyi nang dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-3: dbus su wa sva stam bha ya stam bha ya ha /
K12D0726_H0676:75a-4: 'khor lo nang ma la wa wa wa wa wa wa wa wa zhes bya ba bri bar bya'o //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-5: phyi ma la wa aom wa /
K12D0726_H0676:75a-12: wa re wa zhes bya ba bris te phan tshun
K12D0726_H0676:75a-13: g-yas pa g-yon du 'khor lo re re sbas na
K12D0726_H0676:75a-15: rig sngags kyi sbyor ba mnan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa bzhi pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:75a-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa'
K12D0726_H0676:75a-17: 'jam dpal gzhon nus me tog mand'a ra ba dang
K12D0726_H0676:75a-19: ku mu da la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das la
K12D0726_H0676:75a-20: gtor ro; ;lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sgra du ma
K12D0726_H0676:75a-21: yang sgrags so // de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
K12D0726_H0676:75a-22: dam tshig kyang gang gis 'grub par 'gyur zhes zhus pa dang /
K12D0726_H0676:75a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K12D0726_H0676:75a-24: so so'i dam tshig sdom gnas te //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-25: lha yi 'khor lo dang ldan pas //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-26: srog chags dag ni bsad pa spang //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-27: ma byin pa dag mi blang zhing //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-28: bud med mi bsten smad mi bya //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-29: brdzun ni rnam pa kun tu spang //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-30: myos 'gyur dag dang sha dag dang //
K12D0726_H0676:75a-31: rku zhing rnam pa rtag tu spang //
K12D0726_H0676:75b-0: mi rnams thams cad kun @75b la ni; ;chags pa'i sems kun spang pa ste //
K12D0726_H0676:75b-1: ma bzhin du ni kun la ni //
K12D0726_H0676:75b-2: phan pa'i sems kyis kun la bkur //
K12D0726_H0676:75b-3: dam tshig sdom la gnas pa yi //
K12D0726_H0676:75b-4: las rnams kun la mthu yod 'gyur //
K12D0726_H0676:75b-5: zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
K12D0726_H0676:75b-6: dam tshig dang sdom pa bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu rtsa lnga pa'o ////
K12D0726_H0676:75b-7: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K12D0726_H0676:75b-8: tshangs pa la sogs pa lha dpag tu med pa dang /
K12D0726_H0676:75b-9: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nu la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dag dang /
K12D0726_H0676:75b-12: lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rjes su
K12D0726_H0676:75b-13: yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la
K12D0726_H0676:75b-15: bcom ldan 'das ma sgrol ma'i rgyud las sna tshogs bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so ////
K12D0726_H0676:75b-16: rgya gar gyi mkhan po dharma shr'i mi tra dang /
